label: Trolleys and Carts
description: Products designed to transport goods or people, typically with wheels and a handle.

subcategories.label: Shopping Trolleys
subcategories.description: Trolleys designed for carrying groceries or shopping.

subcategories.label: Heavy Duty Trolleys
subcategories.description: Trolleys designed for moving heavy or bulky objects.

subcategories.label: Garden Carts and Trolleys
subcategories.description: Carts and trolleys designed for use in the garden.
